channel.title: Pages on Red Beard and Curly
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Red Beard and Curly

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Lars Diget, and I’m a dad, husband, maker, and amateur photographer. This blog intends to share any idea, thought, or inspiration, I might have, in the form of blog posts or photographs. In my day job, I work for the best toy manufacturer in the world, LEGO®, creating digital experiences for kids of all ages. I’m primarily involved with projects in the initial phases, even before they are actual projects.
